key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting net interest margins and profitability
Regulatory and compliance risks, including anti-money laundering and data privacy scrutiny
Cybersecurity threats such as data breaches and cyberattacks
Economic dependence on the Mid-Atlantic and Northeastern U.S. regions
Competitive pressures from larger national banks, smaller community banks, and fintech companies
controversies: Potential controversies identified by Sustainalytics, though no significant incidents reported
environmental_issues: Implementation of ESG initiatives, including sustainable lending practices
social_issues: Strong focus on community reinvestment and ethical banking practices
governance_issues: Regulatory oversight and risk management practices under the Risk Committee
